item.title: IMAP/POP/SMTP proxy to add OAuth 2.0
item.description: I researched on IMAP/POP/SMTP proxy programs that transparently add OAuth 2.0 authentication for email clients that don’t support this method. For now, I only leave links here. (Maybe, I will try some of them with mutt, postfix, exim4, etc.) Notable OAuth 2.0 proxy programs As I checked 2023-12: Project (source) star GUI Platform size updated email-oauth2-proxy 446 YES python web 260K 2023-11 o2popper 8 YES python + wx 128K 2022-12 mutt_oauth2.
